EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.CXS.none.L.G.E.2450.Email 2 - Automated WiFi Optimization white paper
EmailTemplate.subject: Provide peak Wi-Fi performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Want to Stand Out to Wi-Fi Customers? Automated Wi-Fi optimization boosts customer satisfaction 70 percent of Wi-Fi subscribers perceive problems when streaming or downloading over Wi-Fi. Innovative solutions combine device data, Wi-Fi analytics, and self-organizing network (SON) technology to offer best-in-class quality of service and enhance customer experience and satisfaction.
Build a strategy that optimizes Wi-Fi network performance and results in significant cost savings. Read the White Paper to discover how to create a reliable Wi-Fi experience. Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
